Title: IRyS
GameText: Power - Emissary of Hope: Discover 1 Song card. Activate 1 ♢ HOPE or 1 ♦ DESPAIR.

- 1 target deals itself 1 fixed infernal and 1 fixed radiant damage
- One hero uses 1 power
- One hero draws 1 card

Title: A New Hope
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
Activate 1 ♢ HOPE.
IRyS may deal herself 1 fixed radiant damage. If she is dealt damage this way, activate 1 ♢ HOPE.
Quote: "I won't look like a different person! What makes IRyS look like IRyS will still be there!"

Title: Angelical Emissary
GameText:
Draw 2 cards.
You may play 1 card or summon 1 Song card.
Quote: "I'm here to bring hope to the people!"

Title: Bloom and Gloom
GameText:
POWER: Activate 1 ♢ HOPE. 1 target regains 2 HP. This card regains 2 HP.
POWER: Activate 1 ♦ DESPAIR. IRyS deals 1 target 2 infernal damage. This card deals 1 target 2 infernal damage.
Quote: "Thank you for giving birth to these...                    these beautiful children!"              "We gave birth together!"

Title: Caesura of Despair
GameText:
♢ HOPE
1 Hero may discover 1 Ongoing card.
♦ DESPAIR 
Destroy up to 1 Ongoing card.
Quote: Darkness will fade away               Light will guide your way

Title: Chant the Melodies
GameText:
You may play 1 Song card.
Activate 1 ♢ HOPE or 1 ♦ DESPAIR.
Quote: I'm here to chant the melodies for you!

Title: Descend
GameText:
Draw 1 card or discover 1 Song card.
Activate 1 ♢ HOPE. 
One ally may regain 2 HP.
Quote: Hope has descended and you are not alone!

Title: Duality of the Nephilim
GameText: After a ♢ HOPE or ♦ DESPAIR is activated on a Song card, you may activate the    ♢ HOPE or ♦ DESPAIR on that card that you have not activated this turn.
Quote: "Half-angel, half-demon?"             "Yes, don't forget the half-demon part, but it's almost non-existent, so no worries."

Title: HERE COMES HOPE
GameText:
♢ HOPE
Each Hero draws 1 card.
♦ DESPAIR
1 ally Hero may discard 1 card. If they do, they play 1 card.
Quote: Who is the criminal                  Who knows the answer?

Title: HiRyS, It's IRyS!
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
Either summon 1 Limited card or play 1 Song card.
Use 1 power.
Quote: "HiRyS! Iiiit's IRyS!"                     "Oh shaddup, I'm not the only one with a greeting, right?"

Title: Joy With You
GameText:
♢ HOPE
IRyS and 1 ally may each regain 2 HP.
♦ DESPAIR
IRyS and 1 ally each deal 1 target 2 infernal damage.
Quote: Knowing our emotions were as one        And I just want to chase that feeling again

Title: Nameless Sadness
GameText:
♢ HOPE
Each Hero target regains 1 HP.
♦ DESPAIR
IRyS deals each non-Hero target 1 irreducible infernal damage.
Quote: How can I stop this anger crying in my heart? Still, I can't stop wishing for better days

Title: Only in Hope
GameText:
♢ HOPE
Select up to 2 targets. Until your next START PHASE, -1 damage dealt to those targets.
♦ DESPAIR
Select up to 2 targets. Until your next START PHASE, -1 damage dealt by those targets.
Quote: Only in hope lies salvation               Do you hear my voice calling?

Title: The Fall of Hope
GameText:
Draw 1 card or discover 1 Song card.
Activate 1 ♦ DESPAIR.
1 ally Hero may use 1 power.
Quote: "Hope has descended and died at the same time. Okay."

Title: YABAIRyS
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
Activate 1 ♦ DESPAIR.
IRyS may deal 1 ally 1 fixed infernal damage. If that ally is dealt damage this way, activate 1 ♦ DESPAIR.
Quote: "Why are you running? There's                            nothing to be afraid of!"                 "Why is she like this?!"
